ayahs.text: Hm^
tanziylu {lokita`bi mina {ll~ahi {loEaziyzi {loHakiymi
<in~a fiY {ls~ama`wa`ti wa{lo>aroDi la'aAya`tK l~ilomu&ominiyna
wafiY xaloqikumo wamaA yabuv~u min daA^b~apK 'aAya`tN l~iqawomK yuwqinuwna
wa{xotila`fi {l~ayoli wa{ln~ahaAri wamaA^ >anzala {ll~ahu mina {ls~amaA^'i min r~izoqK fa>aHoyaA bihi {lo>aroDa baEoda mawotihaA wataSoriyfi {lr~iya`Hi 'aAya`tN l~iqawomK yaEoqiluwna
tiloka 'aAya`tu {ll~ahi natoluwhaA Ealayoka bi{loHaq~i fabi>aY~i HadiyvK] baEoda {ll~ahi wa'aAya`tihi. yu&ominuwna
wayolN l~ikul~i >af~aAkK >aviymK
yasomaEu 'aAya`ti {ll~ahi tutolaY` Ealayohi vum~a yuSir~u musotakobirFA ka>an l~amo yasomaEohaA faba$~irohu biEa*aAbK >aliymK
wa<i*aA Ealima mino 'aAya`tinaA $ayo_#FA {t~axa*ahaA huzuwFA >uw@la`^}ika lahumo Ea*aAbN m~uhiynN
m~in waraA^}ihimo jahan~amu walaA yugoniY Eanohum m~aA kasabuwA@ $ayo_#FA walaA maA {t~axa*uwA@ min duwni {ll~ahi >awoliyaA^'a walahumo Ea*aAbN EaZiymN
ha`*aA hudFY wa{l~a*iyna kafaruwA@ bi_#aAya`ti rab~ihimo lahumo Ea*aAbN m~in r~ijozK >aliymN
{ll~ahu {l~a*iY sax~ara lakumu {lobaHora litajoriYa {lofuloku fiyhi bi>amorihi. walitabotaguwA@ min faDolihi. walaEal~akumo ta$okuruwna
wasax~ara lakum m~aA fiY {ls~ama`wa`ti wamaA fiY {lo>aroDi jamiyEFA m~inohu <in~a fiY *a`lika la'aAya`tK l~iqawomK yatafak~aruwna
qul l~il~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ yagofiruwA@ lil~a*iyna laA yarojuwna >ay~aAma {ll~ahi liyajoziYa qawomF[A bimaA kaAnuwA@ yakosibuwna
mano Eamila Sa`liHFA falinafosihi. wamano >asaA^'a faEalayohaA vum~a <ilaY` rab~ikumo turojaEuwna
walaqado 'aAtayonaA baniY^ <isora`^'iyla {lokita`ba wa{loHukoma wa{ln~ubuw~apa warazaqona`hum m~ina {lT~ay~iba`ti wafaD~alona`humo EalaY {loEa`lamiyna

wa'aAtayona`hum bay~ina`tK m~ina {lo>amori famaA {xotalafuw^A@ <il~aA min[ baEodi maA jaA^'ahumu {loEilomu bagoyF[A bayonahumo <in~a rab~aka yaqoDiY bayonahumo yawoma {loqiya`mapi fiymaA kaAnuwA@ fiyhi yaxotalifuwna
vum~a jaEalona`ka EalaY` $ariyEapK m~ina {lo>amori fa{t~abiEohaA walaA tat~abiEo >ahowaA^'a {l~a*iyna laA yaEolamuwna
<in~ahumo lan yugonuwA@ Eanka mina {ll~ahi $ayo_#FA wa<in~a {lZ~a`limiyna baEoDuhumo >awoliyaA^'u baEoDK wa{ll~ahu waliY~u {lomut~aqiyna
ha`*aA baSa`^}iru liln~aAsi wahudFY waraHomapN l~iqawomK yuwqinuwna
>amo Hasiba {l~a*iyna {jotaraHuwA@ {ls~ay~i_#aAti >an n~ajoEalahumo ka{l~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ waEamiluwA@ {lS~a`liHa`ti sawaA^'F m~aHoyaAhumo wamamaAtuhumo saA^'a maA yaHokumuwna
waxalaqa {ll~ahu {ls~ama`wa`ti wa{lo>aroDa bi{loHaq~i walitujozaY` kul~u nafosK] bimaA kasabato wahumo laA yuZolamuwna

>afara'ayota mani {t~axa*a <ila`hahu, hawaY`hu wa>aDal~ahu {ll~ahu EalaY` EilomK waxatama EalaY` samoEihi. waqalobihi. wajaEala EalaY` baSarihi. gi$a`wapF faman yahodiyhi min[ baEodi {ll~ahi >afalaA ta*ak~aruwna
waqaAluwA@ maA hiYa <il~aA HayaAtunaA {ld~unoyaA namuwtu wanaHoyaA wamaA yuholikunaA^ <il~aA {ld~ahoru wamaA lahum bi*a`lika mino EilomK <ino humo <il~aA yaZun~uwna
wa<i*aA tutolaY` Ealayohimo 'aAya`tunaA bay~ina`tK m~aA kaAna Huj~atahumo <il~aA^ >an qaAluwA@ {}otuwA@ bi_#aAbaA^}inaA^ <in kuntumo Sa`diqiyna
quli {ll~ahu yuHoyiykumo vum~a yumiytukumo vum~a yajomaEukumo <ilaY` yawomi {loqiya`mapi laA rayoba fiyhi wala`kin~a >akovara {ln~aAsi laA yaEolamuwna
walil~ahi muloku {ls~ama`wa`ti wa{lo>aroDi wayawoma taquwmu {ls~aAEapu yawoma}i*K yaxosaru {lomuboTiluwna
wataraY` kul~a >um~apK jaAviyapF kul~u >um~apK tudoEaY`^ <ilaY` kita`bihaA {loyawoma tujozawona maA kuntumo taEomaluwna
ha`*aA kita`bunaA yanTiqu Ealayokum bi{loHaq~i <in~aA kun~aA nasotansixu maA kuntumo taEomaluwna
fa>am~aA {l~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ waEamiluwA@ {lS~a`liHa`ti fayudoxiluhumo rab~uhumo fiY raHomatihi. *a`lika huwa {lofawozu {lomubiynu
wa>am~aA {l~a*iyna kafaruw^A@ >afalamo takuno 'aAya`tiY tutolaY` Ealayokumo fa{sotakobarotumo wakuntumo qawomFA m~ujorimiyna
wa<i*aA qiyla <in~a waEoda {ll~ahi Haq~N wa{ls~aAEapu laA rayoba fiyhaA qulotum m~aA nadoriY maA {ls~aAEapu <in n~aZun~u <il~aA Zan~FA wamaA naHonu bimusotayoqiniyna
wabadaA lahumo say~i_#aAtu maA EamiluwA@ waHaAqa bihim m~aA kaAnuwA@ bihi. yasotahozi'uwna
waqiyla {loyawoma nansaY`kumo kamaA nasiytumo liqaA^'a yawomikumo ha`*aA wama>owaY`kumu {ln~aAru wamaA lakum m~in n~a`Siriyna
*a`likum bi>an~akumu {t~axa*otumo 'aAya`ti {ll~ahi huzuwFA wagar~atokumu {loHayaw`pu {ld~unoyaA fa{loyawoma laA yuxorajuwna minohaA walaA humo yusotaEotabuwna
